text: "Flowers" is a song recorded by American entertainer Miley Cyrus. It was released January 12, 2023, as the lead single from her eighth studio album, Endless Summer Vacation (2023). The song speaks of independence after a romantic breakup. It was compared to Bruno Mars' "When I Was Your Man" (2013) due to similar lyrics. The song entered at number one on several charts worldwide, including the United States, where it was her second Billboard Hot 100 number-one single, after "Wrecking Ball" in 2013.
